message: I have imagemagick working fine but i cant get it to work with php on xampp. Any idea how?
when i try to compile the thing, it complains with 'checking for MagickWand.h header file... configure: error: Cannot locate header file MagickWand.h'
This is a decent introduction to installing ImageMagick in Mac OS X: http://benford.bluhelix.com/installing-imagemagick-php-libraries-on-macos-with-xampp/
lol I did that, but without reading it.. a day lost.. it would have been usefull :P
